column2:
Hey man , you wanna buy some weed ?
Some what ?
Weed ! You know ? Pot , Ganja , Mary Jane some chronic !
Oh , umm , no thanks .
I also have blow if you prefer to do a few lines .
No , I am ok , really .
Come on man ! I even got dope and acid ! Try some !
Do you really have all of these drugs ? Where do you get them from ?
I got my connections ! Just tell me what you want and I will ll even give you one ounce for free .
Do you really have all of their drugs ? Where do you get them from ?
i get them from the club i work at
column3: I bought those at my vacation center .
